Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Therefore , the improvement of PCE and J sc in the fabricated photovoltaic devices is derived from the enhanced π-π interaction between polymers that results from the introduction of perylene units .

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| J sc |

Note: PCE stands for Power Conversion Efficiency, and J sc stands for Short-Circuit Current Density. These are both properties of photovoltaic devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I see that there is only one clear "Material Property" entity mentioned. Here it is presented as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| π-π interaction |

Note: π-π interaction is a type of intermolecular force that can occur between aromatic rings, leading to the formation of stable complexes. It is a property of the material that can affect its behavior and performance.
